body:
You might want to try this [tensorflow-gpu-v1.4-cuda-v9-cudnn-v7.whl](https://github.com/mind/wheels/releases/tag/tf1.4-gpu-cuda9) wheel as well as
```bash
sudo echo "/usr/local/cuda-9.0/lib64" >> /etc/ld.so.conf.d/cuda.conf
sudo ldconfig
```
as pointed out in the [nvidia forums](https://devtalk.nvidia.com/default/topic/845363/libcublas-so-7-0-cannot-open-shared-object-file/). Seems to work on an Ubuntu 16.04 machine.
